title: Associated Domains (com.apple.associated-domains)
description: The payload that configures associated domains.

items.description: A dictionary that maps apps to their associated domains.

ApplicationIdentifier.description: The app identifier to associate the domains with.

AssociatedDomains.description: The domains to associate with the app. Each string is in the form of 'service:domain'. Use fully qualified hostnames, such as 'www.example.com'. See 'Supporting associated domains' for more information.

EnableDirectDownloads.description: If 'true', the system enables direct download of data for this domain instead of through a CDN. Set the entitlement value for this domain to 'service:domain?mode=managed'; otherwise, the system ignores this value. Available in macOS 11 and later.

Configuration.title: Configuration
Configuration.description: A dictionary that maps apps to their associated domains.
